member.name: T:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality
member.summary: Specifies the quality at which text is rendered.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.SystemDefault
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap, with the system default rendering hint. The text will be drawn using whatever font smoothing settings the user has selected for the system.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.SingleBitPerPixel
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap. Hinting is not used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.SingleBitPerPixelGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap. Hinting is used to improve character appearance on stems and curvature.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.AntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its anti aliased glyph bitmap without hinting. Better quality due to anti aliasing. Stem width differences may be noticeable because hinting is turned off.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.AntiAliasGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its anti aliased glyph bitmap with hinting. Much better quality due to anti aliasing, but at a higher performance cost.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.TextQuality.ClearTypeGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph CT bitmap with hinting. The highest quality setting. Used to take advantage of ClearType font features.

member.name: T:Telerik.Charting.Styles.ImageQuality
member.summary: Specifies the quality at which image is rendered.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.ImageQuality.Default
member.summary: Specifies the default mode.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.ImageQuality.AntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies anti aliased rendering.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.ImageQuality.HighQuality
member.summary: Specifies high quality, low speed rendering.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.Styles.ImageQuality.None
member.summary: Specifies no anti aliasing.
